description: Bangladesh government on August 10, has issued sweeping directives on wearing masks. According to the directives, all offices must ensure wearing masks. Recipients of services at all healthcare centers, must wear mask and the hospital authorities will ensure it. The use of masks must be ensured at all places, including educational institutions & places of worship. The local administrations and steering committees will make sure the directive. Buyers and sellers at shopping malls and shops must use masks while local authorities and the market management committees will ensure. Buyers and sellers should not buy or sell any product without wearing masks to be ensured by the local administrations and hat-bazaar committees. Public transport drivers, their assistants and passengers must wear masks. A passenger must wear a mask before boarding a public transport while the authorities concerned, law enforcement agencies and the owners' associations will ensure the matter. Workers at all industrial factories, including garment factories, pedestrians, hawkers, rickshaw-pullers, van drivers and persons working in hotels and restaurants should wear masks. During holding public gatherings or social ceremonies, all must comply with the rule of wearing masks for public safety.
